radiographic_examinations.findings: The appendix is enlarged measuring 1 cm with surrounding fat stranding. There is associated cecal wall thickening and surrounding fat stranding. There are prominent right lower quadrant mesenteric lymph nodes which measure up to 9 mm. The liver, pancreas, spleen, kidneys, urinary bladder, and reproductive organs are within normal limits. No evidence of drainable fluid collection or appendicolith. Sigmoid diverticulosis without evidence of acute diverticulitis. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion.
